pageContext.claim: “Our nation is witnessing a merciless campaign to wipe out our history, defame our heroes, erase our values, and indoctrinate our children. Angry mobs are trying to tear down statues of our Founders, deface our most sacred memorials, and unleash a wave of violent crime in our cities.”
pageContext.analysis: The mostly peaceful protests over police brutality are taking place in cities across the country run by officials from both parties.
